title: PMS 2.0 257 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Rob Ninkovich, Ian Rapoport, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today’s show, Pat and the boys break down tonight’s Thursday Night Football game between Fitzmagic & Minshew Mania. Joining the show is 2x Super Bowl Champion, member of the New England Patriots 2010’s All-Decade Team, NFL analyst for ESPN and friend of the show, Rob Ninkovich. Pat and Rob chat about Bill Belichick’s recent press conference attire, how he thinks the Patriots will be this year with Cam Newton, how many times he had to get pain killing shots while in the NFL, and Nink shares some hilarious stories from when he was in the NFL (15:13-39:42). Later, on another installment of McAfee & Hawk Sports Talk, Pat and AJ welcome two great guests. First, NFL Network Insider, friend of the show, Rapsheet, Ian Rapoport joins the program. Pat, AJ, and Ian discuss how it is that he became an insider, and what he would tell a younger kid trying to break into the business, what he’s hearing about some of the key WR who are questionable for this weekend, and if he can give any leads on any stories he’s currently working on (42:27-1:04:17). Later, Pat and AJ welcome 9 year NFL vet at DB, cohost of the Man-To-Man Pod, Everything DB, Darius Butler to the show to give everyone a lock on which QB’s over/under for passing yards tonight, plus much more (1:05:43-1:17:29). Subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow as we close in on 1 million subscribers and a $100,000 giveaway, and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
